title: Crawl v0.6
description:
About This Game
Crawl is the local multiplayer dungeon crawler where your friends control the monsters! ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bullet-hell beat-em-up meets old-school RPG, in an arcadey party-game for up to 4 players.


One player is the hero, exploring a randomly generated dungeon full of traps and monsters - all controlled by the other players. If you slay the hero you take their place and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your turn to crawl! Then it's a race to gain enough XP and loot to reach the final battle, where it's all on one as the other players collectively control the hulking final boss!
